website_summaries.verdict: The Vans Checkerboard Old Skool is a cool new twist on an iconic shoe. The brand brings two of the most well-loved Vans favorites together—the Old Skool silhouette and the checkerboard pattern. When combined, they create an eye-grabbing design that’s great for strutting on the streets. The shoe is comfortable, durable, is true-to-size, and gives an excellent fit.The checkerboard squares are far from a pure black color and the shoe can only accommodate thin inserts. But with its low pricing, the points are stacked firmly in the shoe’s favor.
pros: Nearly all who reviewed the Vans Checkerboard Old Skool praised the exemplary style of the sneaker
The casual low-top footwear is comfortable and needs no breaking-in, several purchasers said
According to a good number of testers, the lifestyle sneaker runs true to size
The Checkerboard Old Skool is a versatile footwear that is a great addition to any collection, some consumers remarked
They added that the shoe could go with different outfits and looks
A few customers declared that the low-top sneaker is “one of the best shoes you can buy for their pricing.”
The Vans Checkerboard Old Skool provides a nice fit, a handful of individuals remarked
They also mentioned that the shoe could accommodate thin inserts if you wish for more cushioning
cons: A few people were disappointed that the black squares on the Vans Checkerboard Old Skool came lighter than expected
They described the color as “a faded sort of black.”
Two people wished the insole of the sneaker was removable

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they are so comfy. I even wore them for a pretty muddy run (But they are no longer white as to be expected)
customer_reviews.author: Smaybelline

customer_reviews.title: Present for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: She loved them. She has various pairs of Vans and is a huge fan of them. They go with pertty much everything and are really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs A Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, used on my holiday to tunisia, comfortable fit, exceptional value for money although I did get them in the sale
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Tight fitting and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very Quick delivery! These shoes are really nice to look at but need to be worn in ! They are agony to walk in! Absuteley no way u could wear them without socks!
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these for myself for summer but on delivery the coral was a little bright for me. However my daughter took one look at them and loved them! So all in all a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Penny Pincher

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Received this item two days before predicted date, perfect condition both inside and out the box - Perfect colour (black and white) Saved a lot of money as opposed to buying them in a store!! Can't rate them enough!! Very happy :-)
customer_reviews.author: E. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great for everyday wear, so comfortable and great purchase, ended up purchasing 4 more pairs of vans to date
customer_reviews.author: Mairead McNicholl

customer_reviews.title: Vans
customer_reviews.text: Liked the colour laces they are a better price than the black vans I brought why is this? White is a good summer colour
customer_reviews.author: Yvonnie

customer_reviews.title: Summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wear casual shoe to go with summer outfits. This needs to be part of your holiday wear. Great
customer_reviews.author: Lindiloo

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Came only one day late and in the "vans of the wall" too. They look exactlly like the ones on the website. They're really sturdy and comfy, although not quite sure whether the rain suits them. All round great product, really happy!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: come up big
customer_reviews.text: look lovely but come up big kept anyway to grow into
customer_reviews.author: smudger

customer_reviews.title: Vans Lite!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in Steeple Grey... I really love these Vans, because they're extremely comfortable, light and much slouchier than other Vans which can feel quite heavy and restricting due to them being made for skateboarding! I'm sure these would also be great for skateboarding too, as long as you're experienced! The color of these were exactly what I wanted and I love the "Vans Off The Wall" logo on these, it looks very sweet!! The sizing on these is perfect also. Will definitely be buying more of these in different colors, an awesome shoe for us Ladies!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. L. J. Braisby

customer_reviews.title: van hello kitty
customer_reviews.text: Really really nice vans for children good quality and lasted well a bargain too had the fare share on day outs.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Cool slip ons
customer_reviews.text: Nice summer shoes for my son who struggles with laces and loves the colour orange. Quite big for their size so just watch this but overall he is delighted so I am too!!
customer_reviews.author: Poppy's mum

customer_reviews.title: good shoes good service
customer_reviews.text: came quickly and well packaged very pleased good strong material and great colours all as described shoe is very slim fit which may be uncomfortable if u have wide feet
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Beware The Colour
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in Azalea/True White, which looks like a very deep pink/red colour in the image above, but when they arrived, they were in fact very bright pink. I probably wouldn't have bought them if I'd known, but it's turned out to be a happy accident as I do love them. Just beware that in the case of this colourway at least, you may not get exactly what you're expecting!
customer_reviews.author: sappy16

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Typical Vans - will last forever (well made sole and canvas top) and look cool too (just like the image)!
customer_reviews.author: Harad

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these shoes to Amazon as my mum ordered them for me without even asking me first. Not only are they plimsolls (we haven't needed to wear them since primary school), but they weren't even the right size! I have also just noticed whilst writing this review, they are women's shoes! Really?! C'mon! Honestly sometimes I actually think she just wants me to get beaten up at school. I have given the shoes 3 stars because I like the name 'Vans', which reminds of the big red Royal Mail van my dad used to drive before he left us.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie boi

product_meta.title: Vans Old Skool Trainers Men Beige Low Top Trainers Shoes
product_meta.description: Urban street-wear fans will love these Vans trainers. Step out in style.
